---
title: "About me"
comments: true
---


I am Melanie Tietje, a biologist at the [Natural History Museum in Berlin](https://www.naturkundemuseum.berlin/en/einblicke/mitarbeiter/melanie.tietje), Germany. In my PhD project I work on traits that influence extinction risk in fossil and modern amphibian species.

I am a fellow in the [fellow program open science](https://wikimedia.de/wiki/BildungWissenschaftKultur/Fellowprogramm/Fellows) since September 2016, where I am exploring certain aspects of open science like community feedback in data analysis and publication.
